metadata.title: Mother of martyred journalist Arshad Sharif passes away

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 26 (APP):The mother of renowned journalist and martyr Arshad Sharif passed away on Saturday, leaving behind a legacy of strength and faith that deeply inspired her family and well-wishers. According to family sources, her funeral prayers will be offered tonight on Sunday at 9 PM at H-11 Graveyard, Islamabad. She will be laid to rest beside her beloved son, Arshad Sharif Shaheed. The news of her passing has saddened journalists, colleagues and members of civil society across the country. Condolence messages are pouring in, with prayers for eternal peace of the departed soul and for strength to the bereaved family.
